text: Table 19-3. Key Members of the DirectoryInfo Type Member Meaning in Life Create() Creates a directory (or set of subdirectories) when given a path name CreateSubdirectory() Delete() Deletes a directory and all its contents GetDirectories() Returns an array of DirectoryInfo objects that represent all subdirectories in the current directory GetFiles() Retrieves an array of FileInfo objects that represent a set of files in the given directory MoveTo() Moves a directory and its contents to a new path Parent Retrieves the parent directory of this directory Root Gets the root portion of a path
